sentences.sentence: Their Majesties will open the new bridge today.
sentences.translation: 王后陛下今天将为新桥落成剪彩。

sentences.sentence: Your Majesties, Excellencies, Ladies and gentlemen.
sentences.translation: 国王和王后陛下，各位阁下，女士们、先生们。

sentences.sentence: Your Majesties, Your Royal Highnesses, Esteemed Nobel Laureates, Ladies and Gentlemen.
sentences.translation: 尊敬的国王和皇后陛下，尊敬的诺贝尔奖得主们，女士们先生们。
